title: Hans-Joachim Watzke - Wikipedia
snippet: Hans-Joachim "Aki" Watzke (born 21 June 1959, Marsberg, North Rhine-Westphalia) is a German businessman and football official. He served as the CEO of Borussia Dortmund from 2005 until 2025 and is the club's elected president since November 23, 2025.

title: Ownership of Borussia Dortmund | Download Scientific Diagram
snippet: Ownership Landscape: an RBV perspective of football leagues’ configurations diversity · Article · Feb 2025 · Ricardo Gúdel · View · ... Members' associations, also known as supporter-owned or community-owned clubs, are primarily found in Germany (e.g., FC Bayern Munich and BV Borussia Dortmund) and, to some extent, in Spain (e.g., Real Madrid CF and FC Barcelona) [16]. These clubs operate under models where the majority of voting rights are held by the club's members, who are typically fans [17]. ...

title: Who owns Borussia Dortmund (BVB)? Owners' net worth, source of wealth and ownership history
snippet: Borussia Dortmund is currently owned by a publicly traded company with major shareholders including Bernd Geske, Evonik Industries AG, Signal Iduna, Ralph Dommermuth Beteiligungen GmbH and Puma SE.

title: Borussia Dortmund GmbH : Shareholders Board Members Managers and Company Profile | DE0005493092 | MarketScreener
snippet: Borussia Dortmund GmbH & Co KGaA is a Germany-based company engaged in the operation of Ballspielverein Borussia (BVB), a professional football club based in Dortmund, Germany. The Company has around 8 functional areas such as sports, communications, human resources, organization, finance, legal and IR, marketing and digitalization, commercial partnerships.
